thread.title: Georgia Dome officials investigating escalator mishap that caused injuries after Falcons game
thread.title_full: Georgia Dome officials investigating escalator mishap that caused injuries after Falcons game

title: Georgia Dome officials investigating escalator mishap that caused injuries after Falcons game
text:
Georgia Dome officials investigating escalator mishap that caused injuries after Falcons game THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   12:30 pmLast   12:30 pm   
Organizations: 
Georgia (561) 
ATLANTA — Georgia Dome officials are investigating what caused an escalator to malfunction, causing injuries to approximately 30 fans following the Atlanta Falcons' win over the Washington Redskins on Sunday. 
According to a statement released by the Georgia Dome on Tuesday, the escalator at Upper Gate D inside the facility stopped as fans were leaving the game. 
The release states that about 30 fans were treated for minor injuries. An Associated Press photographer saw a woman being taken to an ambulance.
